description: Compiling unpublished documents from 1970s, it's an incredible window into the origins of the entire RPG genre.
title: The new Making of Original Dungeons & Dragons book is a vital piece of gaming history

description: Controller, check. Pseudogiant, definitely. Dogs? Absolutely. Anomalies, bandits, and the list goes on.
title: Let's count all the ways I'm gonna die horribly in the new Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl trailer

description: Catch up on the 70+ trailers and 15 first reveals from this year's massive PC Gaming Show.
title: Every game, trailer, and announcement in the 2024 PC Gaming Show

description: This boat can jump.
title: Gunboat God is a hectic seafaring shoot 'em up with Cuphead and Luftrausers vibes

description: Fight the nonbelievers.
title: 'Grow your cult… with your friends': Worship's new trailer shows off how much chaos you can cause in this dark roguelike

description: It's inspired by the sleek action of Devil May Cry and Bayonetta.
title: Dead Cells developer shows off upcoming roguelite Windblown and its stylish, fast-paced 3 player co-op

description: Cut down trees in a thunderstorm at your own risk.
title: Stormforge shows survival crafting co-op isn’t just for fair weather friends

description: Two great tastes.
title: Airframe Ultra is Wipeout crossed with Road Rash

description: The new trailer shows more stealth and magic gameplay.
title: Embark on a journey through Icelandic folklore in upcoming adventure game Island of Winds

description: This fantasy farming simulator plans to offer a world of weird and wonderful yokai, and I'm all for it.
title: Gone are the days of cows and chickens in farming sims, I'm replacing my farm animals with yokai in Tales of Seikyu

description: XCOM meets Groundhog Day.
title: With a roguelike time loop twist, Every Day We Fight takes a whole new approach to the turn-based strategy genre

description: Formica, disco, and death.
title: Rise of the Golden Idol goes full Columbo as it transports the first game's 18th-century murder solving to the 1970s

description: Only mechs can save Europe.
title: Grit and Valor – 1949 looks like a real-time World War 2 Into the Breach

description: "Running about Fortuna hustling, scheming, causing trouble, or maybe even living an honest life should be a great deal of fun," says Tarn Adams.
title: Dwarf Fortress co-creator has been helping out with Streets of Fortuna, a sandbox RPG in a procedurally-generated city where you can be an art thief, a chef or a big ol' flirt

description: The city has fallen to the zombie horde. Can you escape before it's too late?
title: Dread, tension, and tough choices abound in stealthy zombie survival game Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days

description: A new glimpse via the PC Gaming Show, ahead of its release this month.
title: Still Wakes the Deep launch trailer sets the scene for a grizzly ship-bound cosmic horror

description: Tidy up and make sure the water is warm for all your extraterrestrial customers.
title: Hotel Galactic is a cozy Ghibli-inspired crafting and management sim where you'll host adorable intergalactic visitors

description: Screenbound taps into the real magic of childhood: staring at a little Game Boy instead of paying attention to the world around you.
title: Surreal platformer Screenbound has you platforming in 2D and 3D simultaneously with the help of a magical little Game Boy you're constantly holding up to your face like the world's most indoor kid

description: As if picking the perfect place to build wasn't tough enough, now I have to go island hopping.
title: Captain your own flying island base in wind-powered crafting survival game Aloft's new co-op demo

description: Take the fight to the Druid Mafia.
title: Absurdist magical XCOM-alike Tactical Breach Wizards is coming this August, with its free demo available to try right now

description: Learn a new language in a puzzle game that lets you figure out the rules for yourself.
title: You're not just solving word puzzles in Lok Digital, you're advancing civilization for these adorable inky little worm dudes

description: How does everyone get these eccentric and wealthy relations, anyhow?
title: Blue Prince is a choose your own mystery game where you have to decide what's behind the next door

description: Become a witch of the woods and make Baba Yaga proud.
title: Slavic witchcrafting game Reka is equal parts cozy and creepy and it's coming to early access in August

description: Unveiled at the PC Gaming Show, Generation Exile is about "finding ways to grow and thrive" without endlessly extracting more resources from the environment.
title: New city builder Generation Exile is a shot across the bow for both strategy game design and the gaming industry at large: 'It's simply not possible to keep expanding forever'

description: In the 2090s you've got to kill fast to keep going.
title: Beat down 'Robillionaires' in '80s anime-inspired FPS Mullet Madjack

description: From veteran devs behind the likes of Red Orchestra and Squad.
title: '83 is a milsim going for 'accessible realism' in a timeline where the Cold War exploded

description: The developer of Ashen is nearly ready to launch its next action-RPG.
title: Magic and gunpowder-powered 'souls-lite' Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is bringing a demo to Steam Next Fest

description: What if the Spartan II soldiers did Wacky Races instead of the Human-Covenant War?
title: Deathsprint 66 looks like the best kind of racing game: one where you race murderous robot men instead of boring old cars

description: It's not Battlefield, it's not an extraction shooter—it's something that looks altogether new.
title: Striden looks like a very serious multiplayer shooter until the irradiated bear shows up

description: It belies the title, but Satan won't complain.
title: No More Room In  Hell 2 is a zombie apocalypse game that wants to get back to terror over the baseball bat fantasies

description: Core Keeper's 1.0 trailer is here.
title: One of our favourite co-op survival games gets two new classes as it hits full release this summer

description: The twin-stick shooter is set to enter early access in July.
title: Forget Mjolnir—Odinfall is a zany Viking bullet hell where you'll murder a mechanised pantheon of Norse gods

description: The demo is pretty slick and the full game is shaping up for next year.
title: Unbeatable is an exceedingly cool rhythm RPG 'where music is illegal' coming in 2025

description: Mix Dwarf Fortress, Among Us, and RimWorld and you're getting close.
title: Space Station 14, a modern reimagining of a cultish and richly complex online RPG, has just launched into early access

description: Terrain conductor mode looks pretty good in locomotion.
title: Unrailed 2 will have a 'terrain conductor' level maker mode so you can terrorize your friends with custom challenges

description: School's in for summer.
title: Demonschool is a promising occult turn-based tactics take on Persona that's finally coming out this year, and I think we've got another Into the Breach on our hands

description: The sequel to the narrative-driven RPG is almost here.
title: Tabletop-inspired RPG Citizen Sleeper 2 lets you command a ship and a crew in its sci-fi future early next year

description: For the strategy fan in a hurry.
title: Battle Aces lets you play a full competitive RTS match in just 10 minutes

description: Watch the new gameplay trailer from the 2024 PC Gaming Show.
title: This upcoming 'extraction horror' FPS has a big twist: 2 player-controlled 'alien monsters' that are hunting the human squads

description: The survival and strategy hybrid hits early access on July 16.
title: Survival RTS with a Lego-inspired building system Cataclismo launches next month

description: The upcoming shooter is described as a "lightning-quick hunt-the-hunters action fantasy."
title: I Am Your Beast looks sort of like a 3D Hotline Miami

description: Last Moon is a throwback to the cartoon RPGs of yore, with co-op.
title: Explore a world on the body of a giant in this Zelda-esque RPG

description: I will be singing the trailer music to myself for weeks.
title: The Unpacking developer is swapping out wordless storytelling for musical numbers and 3D puzzling in Tempopo

description: It takes more than just the teams to make game day happen.
title: Copa City is the 'first football tycoon' game where you'll manage stadium logistics, fan foot traffic, and the chaos of game day

description: Tripwire’s venerable shooter is back and turning the dials up to 11.
title: Killing Floor 3 looks like essential co-op carnage and I can't wait to jump in with friends

description: Previously codenamed Hornet, Phantom Line is the first project from Antistatic Studios.
title: Phantom Line is a 'paranormal SWAT' co-op FPS set in post-nuclear Europe, and there's a playtest happening soon

description: The Sulfur developers just dropped an update to its Steam demo.
title: You don't have to wait for the release of this solo extraction shooter, the demo just got a massive update

description: Who doesn't want a car with a flamethrower on the roof?
title: Fumes is Mad Max meets Robot Wars and I am very much here for that

description: "The revolution will not be choreographed."
title: You can dance, dance, and start a revolution in All Systems Dance: a grooving adventure game where you reprogram robots by shakin' it

description: You gotta take the good with the bad.
title: Sumerian Six is a WW2 stealth tactics game that summons up all my childhood memories of Desperados and Commandos, and also summons up literal demons

description: Lock 'n' Toad.
title: Take back your swamp in Toads of the Bayou, a deckbuilding roguelike with a splash of turn-based-tactics for flavour

description: The new trailer shows off the game's base-building.
title: Fight for freedom or corporate overlords in Mars Tactics, a scrappy cross between XCOM and Red Faction

description: We've got 10,000 PC Game Pass keys to give away.
title: Grab a free month of PC Game Pass here while supplies last!

description: Microsoft really brought home the bacon this showcase weekend.
title: The 6 biggest reveals at the Xbox Games Showcase

description: But the Celestials have still made me a convert.
title: I played Stormgate's new faction with two of the world's top RTS players, but even they couldn't save me from my own ineptitude

description: Get to know the space angels.
title: Everything we know about Stormgate's angelic Celestial Armada faction

description: Whiskey and stogy optional but encouraged.
title: Sneak past, shoot through, or throw rats at your foes in Fallen Aces, a bloody and creative FPS that is coming out next week

description: The twitchiest FPS in the biz is about to get faster.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6's new 'Omnimovement' could be CoD's best (or worst) idea of all time

description: Full of questions.
title: Sci-fi stealth action game Steel Seed teases some of the story underneath the bloody combat in a new trailer

description: From chaotic crops to rolling around like Sonic, Southfield is going to add a lot to the farming sim space.
title: Silly simulator Southfield is releasing soon, so it's time to put on your overalls and fling yourself into farming

description: Super Saiyan speech.
title: Wander Stars is a fantastically weird mash-up of Pokémon, Dragon Ball, and the power of the English language

description: After four years, the indie immersive RPG is almost here.
title: Streets of Rogue 2's dizzying open world sandbox will debut in early access this August

description: My kinda religion.
title: Bribe and brew your way to fame in boozy monastic management sim Ale Abbey

description: You might want to loot yourself some clothes there, buddy.
title: Lorn Vale is a free-roaming apocalyptic RPG where 'interaction carries weight'—you also play as a naked dude wandering the desert

description: Star Birds is set to be another cozy resource management game in the same vein as Dorfromantik, but takes the experience intergalactic.
title: The team behind Dorfromantik has announced Star Birds, a resource management production game about birds… in space

description: Part farming game, creature-collector, and adventure, it's a weird world with weirder critters.
title: The creatures you collect in first-person farming sim Among the Wild might not be as helpful as you hope: 'They're more of a pain in the ass'

description: And what game there is... well, let's reserve judgement.
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle's latest showcase almost makes it look like they forgot to put a game in there

description: Just take her paintbrush.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 may have the most convoluted villain story I've ever heard of, but at least the action looks cool

description: If Max had a nickel for every time her best friend died as an inciting incident, she'd have two nickels. Which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it's happened twice.
title: Mixtape looks like it's going to do Life is Strange better than the new Life is Strange will

description: You could win this glowing rig with an RTX 4070 Ti Super, and all you have to do is tell us your opinion.
title: Fill out a quick PC Gaming Show survey for a chance to win a mighty $2,499 iBuyPower gaming PC

description: With the pairing of Naoe the ninja and Yasuke the samurai, the stealth and swordfighting seem more in balance than ever.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows' dual protagonists look ready to turn the series' recent identity crisis into a strength

description: Get your big dungeon pants on before the expansion drops in October.
title: Diablo 4: Vessel of Hatred new class is an "apex predator" and we're also getting what sounds suspiciously like a raid

description: Doom: The Dark Ages will feature "a variety of new bone-chewing weaponry," says Bethesda.
title: Doom's new gun is a ludicrous 'skull garbage disposal.' Finally, a gun that cares about sustainability

description: Mysterious energies.
title: Obsidian's next RPG Avowed gets a trailer hinting at a trio of factions—those who want to purge the Dream Scourge, those who want to tame it, and a secret third thing

description: I'm still in a dream.
title: I didn't want to get my hopes up about Metal Gear Solid Delta, but Konami's somehow done it

description: The boys are back.
title: Gears of War is coming back with Marcus and Dom in an Emergence Day prequel

description: Alright, I'm sold.
title: South of Midnight, a gorgeous action adventure game with weighty, Souls-adjacent combat and stylised cutscenes will be dodge-rolling onto PC next year

description: It's a nice trailer, but I was really hoping for more.
title: State of Decay 3 reminds us that it's still in development with a sad new trailer that mostly just makes me think of Dead Island

description: Get in deep with space cult House Va’ruun.
title: Starfield's Shattered Space DLC is finally going to shed light on the RPG's most interesting faction

description: Empires of the Undergrowth is about lots of little guys digging, killing, and eating.
title: I'm not watching trailers this weekend, I'm playing this ridiculously good RTS about ants

description: Ghouls just wanna have fun.
title: Fallout 76 is finally going to let us play as ghouls: 'It'll be a different play style, which we're really excited to see'

description: The first trailer for Black Ops 6 premiered at the Xbox show today.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is doing the '90s this October

description: Doom Guy has a combination chainsaw Captain America shield now
title: Doom Eternal's long-awaited follow-up is a medieval prequel called Doom: The Dark Ages

description: VATS entertainment.
title: A mod has finally given New Vegas the more cinematic VATS visuals of Fallout 3

description: If there's anyone I'd trust to helm a Conan game it's Big Daddy Cain.
title: After Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines, Tim Cain worked up a proposal for a Troika RPG based on Conan
